parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh and en. Default value: zh.

parameters.name: EnvironmentName
parameters.description: The name of the environment instance.

parameters.name: FeePackage
parameters.description:
The payable resource plan. Valid values:

*   If the EnvironmentType parameter is set to CS, set the value to CS_Basic or CS_Pro. Default value: CS_Basic.
*   Otherwise, leave the parameter empty.
